alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 16 at 6:08AM MST until November 16 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Areas with visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Potlatch, La Crosse, Pullman, Colfax, Uniontown, Plummer, Spokane Valley, Rockford, Cheney, Tekoa, Fairfield, Oakesdale, Rosalia, Airway Heights, Davenport, Pomeroy, Downtown Spokane, Clarkston, Genesee, Alpowa Summit, and Moscow. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. In addition freezing temperatures in some areas may result in freezing fog and slick surfaces.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
